name: Happy Farming
description:
Hi There!

This is a game, which I tried to create in a very short amount of time. It had some programming challenges and it wasn't always easy to stay on it. But I finally finished it and I am very happy about it. If you notice any bugs or mistakes, or if you just want to give a simple feedback I am always glad! Give it a try and go for the biggest plant as fast as possible ;) - Let the Golden Plants be with you!
